display.title: Bopper
description: &&3Chutes&&r instantly drop any item dropped on or transferred to them &&dstraight down&&r.
They can be chained to &&dinstantly transport items downwards&&r.
When combined with a &&3Levitation Chamber&&r, made from a snared &&cShulker&&r bullet, they can also instantly &&dtransport items upwards&&r.
Chutes can also be used to craft the &&3Dopper&&r which &&dinserts items in two directions&&r, and the &&3Flopper&&r can &&dpull from the side of a block&&r (and it's linked inventory).
